title: Garlic baked scallops
ingredients: ['16 sea scallops, rinsed and drained', '75g butter, melted', '5 cloves garlic, finely chopped', '2 shallots, chopped', '3 pinches ground nutmeg', 'salt and pepper to taste', '110g breadcrumbs', '4 tablespoons olive oil', '4 tablespoons chopped parsley', 'lemon wedges for garnish']
